itemDescription: Miss British Virgin Islands 2011, contestant in Miss Universe 2012

wikipedia_page.main: Abigail Hyndman (born 1990) is a Virgin Islander beauty pageant titleholder. Crowned Miss British Virgin Islands 2011, she also represented the British overseas territory in the 2012 Miss Universe pageant.

response: * Abigail Hyndman (born 1990), British Virgin Islands beauty pageant titleholder
|  British Virgin Islands || Abigail Hyndman || 22 || Road Town
